eu.fbk.dkm.springles.inferencer

Class DebuggingInferencer.DebuggingSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.fbk.dkm.springles.inferencer.DebuggingInferencer.DebuggingSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Inferencer.Session
    Enclosing class:
    DebuggingInferencer

    final class DebuggingInferencer.DebuggingSession
extends Object
implements Inferencer.Session
    An Inferencer.Session decorator that logs method calls and checks they respect the Inferencer API and lifecycle.

    This class is used together with DebuggingInferencer .

      • logNotification

        private void logNotification(String operation,
                   Iterable<? extends org.openrdf.model.Statement> statements,
                   org.openrdf.model.Resource[] contexts)
        Helper method for logging invocations of statementsAdded(Iterable, Resource...) and statementsRemoved(Iterable, Resource...).
        Parameters:
        operation - the operation being put in the log message, e.g., addition or removal
        statements - the statements argument of the notification
        contexts - the contexts argument of the notification

      • logRewrite

        private void logRewrite(Object expression,
              ClosureStatus closureStatus,
              boolean forwardInferenceEnabled)
        Helper method for logging invocations of #rewriteQuery(QuerySpec, boolean) and #rewriteUpdate(UpdateSpec, boolean).
        Parameters:
        expression - the QuerySpec or UpdateSpec being rewritten
        closureStatus - the current ClosureStatus for the repository
        forwardInferenceEnabled - the forwardInferenceEnabled argument of the rewrite request

      • rewriteQuery

        public <T> QuerySpec<T> rewriteQuery(QuerySpec<T> query,
                            ClosureStatus closureStatus,
                            boolean forwardInferenceEnabled)
                          throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Rewrites a query so to implement query-time backward reasoning. The query to rewrite is supplied already parsed and thus expressed in the Sesame algebra; this guarantee that the expression is syntactically correct and permits to abstract from the actual query language used to express the query (e.g., SPARQL or SERQL). The rewriting, if any, should modify the supplied parsed query object, by either modifying the algebraic expression or the dataset over which the query should be evaluated. Delegates and logs, checking parameters and closed status.
        Specified by:
        rewriteQuery in interface Inferencer.Session
        Parameters:
        query - the query to rewrite
        Returns:
        the rewritten query, possibly the same input object; a null return value signal that the query has not to be evaluated as it is not expected to produce results.
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - in case rewriting failed for any other reason

      • rewriteUpdate

        public UpdateSpec rewriteUpdate(UpdateSpec update,
                       ClosureStatus closureStatus,
                       boolean forwardInferenceEnabled)
                         throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Rewrites an update so to implement query-time backward reasoning. Update expressions (e.g., SPARQL modify) may require querying data in the repository, in which case rewriting has to occur so for query results to be complete. The update expression to rewrite is supplied already parsed and consists in a list of syntactically correct commands, in the Sesame algebra, each possibly associated to a dataset. The rewriting, if any, should modify the supplied parsed update object, by either modifying the algebraic expressions or the datasets over which the update command sequence should be evaluated. Delegates and logs, checking parameters and closed status.
        Specified by:
        rewriteUpdate in interface Inferencer.Session
        Parameters:
        update - the update to rewrite
        Returns:
        the rewritten update, possibly the same input object; a null return value signal that the update has not to be evaluated as it is not expected to produce any modification.
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - in case rewriting failed for any other reason

      • updateClosure
